name: Chuck E. Cheese's Party Galaxy
description:
Explore the universe with Chuck E. Cheese and friends on their Inter-Dimensional Party Jalopy!

Play over 10 all new games, visit far off places and travel through time to gather up your friends, and some crazy souvenirs along the way. Flick, swipe, tap, tilt and yell your way to victory. Do you have what it takes to win the coveted Golden Toilet?
